item.title: About
item.author: chuck.mcandrew@leblibrary.com (Chuck McAndrew)
item.description: Chuck is a librarian and digital privacy advocate. He works to promote access to information, privacy, and intellectual freedom within libraries. He has worked as an auto mechanic, a sword maker, and served as a US Marine. He strongly believes in the power of technology to empower individuals and works to make it more accessible to everyone.
